channel.title: 562 Loading 602 Glitch/Hack?
channel.description:
Hello!
I am a moderator on a 562 loading 602 server, some troll came ont he server, hacked everyone.. Idk how, I asked the owner and he said he tricks the system in loggin gyou out and logging on you're account really fast. Does anyone know how he did it?
Thank you, Mod Kathy.

item.title: 562 Loading 602 Glitch/Hack?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Kathy Mod Kathy
item.description:
@Mod_Kathy wrote:

[quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=496636.msg3631525#msg3631525 date=1308259530]

kill you704:

Its called hacking the owners computer and Disconnecting his internet. Causing the server to loose connection everyone logs out for about 5 minutes or more depending on the computer and then he logs into another kids account from knowing the password. Theres only to ways to find out a password keylogged the files or found out from the owner of the account.

[quote]That is unlikely. Possible, but unlikely. My statement is the probable cause, seeing as most RSPS are poorly coded pieces of shit.
Nvm, the owner fixed it.

Its called hacking the owners computer and Disconnecting his internet. Causing the server to loose connection everyone logs out for about 5 minutes or more depending on the computer and then he logs into another kids account from knowing the password. Theres only to ways to find out a password keylogged the files or found out from the owner of the account.
No.. No one got keylogged, and he said, "I am Mod Kathy!" i was like, Rofl.. No.. Than he was like, "U sure?" He dced me and logged on my account.. Really weird, but the owner fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: 562 Loading 602 Glitch/Hack?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

kill you704:

Its called hacking the owners computer and Disconnecting his internet. Causing the server to loose connection everyone logs out for about 5 minutes or more depending on the computer and then he logs into another kids account from knowing the password. Theres only to ways to find out a password keylogged the files or found out from the owner of the account.

That is unlikely. Possible, but unlikely. My statement is the probable cause, seeing as most RSPS are poorly coded pieces of shit.
